data.decision: Build Duro Cloud - a self-hosted FastAPI service exposing Duro MCP tools via HTTPS, with Supabase for cloud storage and PWA for mobile access
data.rationale: Enables access to Duro memory system from anywhere (mobile, web) without being tied to local machine. Keeps data ownership while adding portability.
alternatives: Tailscale + SSH (simpler but requires home PC always on)
Cloud-sync memory files only (no chat interface)
data.context: User wants to take Duro everywhere. Option 4 from discussion - most powerful but most complex.
